Talk_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Full tummies make for happy Rito! That's
why I like learning new meals out of the
recipe book.
I saw one in there that I know everyone
would love...

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>A fish pie made with <clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
Doesn't that sound yummy?

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Problem is, I can't leave the village to
catch a <clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>, thanks to this
dumb blizzard.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I have everything else—<sp:5:0:0>Tabantha wheat,
goat butter, rock salt...
Talk_00_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Huh? There's no room in your pouch.<sp:0:4:0>I have a present for you, but you'd need
somewhere safe to put it.<sp:0:4:0>Can you make some room and talk to me
again? Then I'll hand it over, promise!
Talk_00_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Really? Thanks!<sp:0:4:0>Now I can cook something that'll make
the whole village feel better!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>OK, mister. Hold out your hand!
Talk_00_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You made some room in your pouch!
Yay! <sp:5:0:0>That means I can give you your
present now!
Talk_00_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>You can eat this to boost your
strength in cold places, <sp:5:0:0>like up
in the Hebra Mountains.
It won't fill your belly, <sp:5:0:0>but if you're
roaming outside the village, I'm sure
you'll find it useful!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Y'know, cooking with <clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>is pretty
easy. <sp:5:0:0>You should try it whenever you
need a boost!
Talk_00_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Hmm. I wanna give you your present,
but your pouch is still too full.<sp:0:4:0>Can you make some room and talk to
me again? Then I'll hand it over, promise!
Talk_00_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>But if I'm gonna make a fish pie, I need
the fish... <sp:5:1:0>I need <clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>!
Talk_00_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I'd have to leave the village to catch a
<clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>, but with the blizzard,
it's not safe.
Hmm. What do I do?
Talk_00_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Full tummies make for happy Rito! That's
why I like learning new meals out of the
recipe book.
I saw one in there that I know everyone
would love...

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>A fish pie made with <clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
Doesn't that sound yummy?

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Problem is, I'm lousy at fishing. <sp:5:1:0>Even if I
go to that <clr:0000>fishpond in front of the village<clr:ffff>,
it's not like I'll catch what I need.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I have everything else—<sp:5:0:0>Tabantha wheat,
goat butter, rock salt...
Talk_00_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Aw, that's OK. You probably don't have
much food, 'cause of the blizzard and all.<sp:0:4:0>I think I might have to quit on the
<clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I just really wanted to
cook a meal that'd make everyone happy.
Talk_00_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>I know how to find the <clr:0000>pond <clr:ffff>with
<clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>... You just <clr:0000>leave the
village and cross the bridge<clr:ffff>.
Problem is, I'm not a great swimmer.
I splash around so much that all the fish
swim away.
So even though the blizzard's over,
I probably still can't catch any <clr:0000>staminoka
bass<clr:ffff>. I'll just scare 'em off.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad_01>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Staminoka bass<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:1:0>Why's it so hard
to get my hands on you?
Talk_00_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>You want to eat the fishy, huh?
That's fine...<sp:0:4:0>I think I might have to quit on the
<clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I just really wanted to
cook a meal that'd make everyone happy.
Talk_00_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>*sniff* <sp:5:1:0>*sniff* *sniff* <sp:5:0:0>I know that smell!


You have <clr:0000>staminoka bass<clr:ffff>, don'tcha,
mister? Is that for me?
Talk_00_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I love learning how to cook! I'm gonna
cook stuff that's so tasty, it makes
everyone in the whole village smile!
